Package org.group7.model.entities.piece

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
org.group7.model.entities.Entity
org.group7.model.entities.piece.Piece
public class Piece extends Entity
The Piece class represents a piece on the board. It extends the Entity class.

    • Piece

      public Piece(Color color, IMoveHandler handler)
      The constructor for the Piece class. It takes in a color and a handler as parameters.
      Parameters:
      color - The parameter "color" is of type "Color". It represents the color of the piece.
      handler - The parameter "handler" is of type "IMoveHandler". It represents the handler for handling move events.

    • handleCollision

      public void handleCollision(Piece p)
      The handleCollision function calls the handleCollision method of the state object, passing in the Piece object and its handler as parameters.
      Specified by:
      handleCollision in class Entity
      Parameters:
      p - The parameter "p" is of type "Piece". It represents the piece that has collided with the current piece.

    • setState

      protected void setState(PieceState s)
      The function sets the state of a piece to the provided state which represents the piece being on either the field or goal-stretch.
      Parameters:
      s - The parameter "s" is of type PieceState, which is the state that we want to set for the object.

    • toggleState

      public void toggleState()
      The function toggles the state of an object (from field to goal-stretch or vice versa).

    • setHandler

      public void setHandler(IMoveHandler handler)
      The function sets the handler for handling move events.
      Parameters:
      handler - The "handler" parameter is of type IMoveHandler. It is used to set the move handler for an object or class.

    • addToGoalStretch
